Class Answers

java.lang.Object
main.Answers
public class Answers extends Object
Answers class represents the manager for all answer-related operations. This class handles the creation, retrieval, updating, and deletion of answers, interfacing with the database through DatabaseHelper.

Copyright: Team 60 CSE 360

Version:
1.00 2025-04-01 Answers class implementation
